title: Episode #81: Suzanne Maloney on Iran
itunes:title: Episode #81: Suzanne Maloney on Iran
itunes:subtitle: Brookings Senior Fellow Suzanne Maloney talks about Iran: common interests with the United States in Iraq and the fight against ISIS, attitudes toward working with the United States, and the prospects for a nuclear deal in the coming weeks and months.
description:
Brookings Senior Fellow Suzanne Maloney talks about Iran: common interests with the United States in Iraq and the fight against ISIS, attitudes toward working with the United States, and the prospects for a nuclear deal in the coming weeks and months.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.
